FuncDef:
The ntp authentication-password complexity-check disable command disables password strength check on NTP identity authentication.
The undo ntp authentication-password complexity-check disable command enables password strength check on NTP server identity authentication. The ntp authentication-password complexity-check disable command disables password strength check on NTP identity authentication. The undo ntp authentication-password complexity-check disable command enables password strength check on NTP server identity authentication. By default, password strength check on NTP server identity authentication is enabled.
Examples: Warning: Password complexity check on NTP authentication will be disabled. Continue?  [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: On a network that requires high security, you are advised to run this command to enable strong password strength check for NTP identity authentication.
